pkgmetadata.longdescription: # based_latexGenerates SVG image code from LaTeX formulas.## Installation```pip install based_latex```## RequirementsThis package requires a [LaTeX distribution](https://www.latex-project.org/), as well as [Ghostscript](https://www.ghostscript.com/) and [Inkscape](https://inkscape.org/).## UsageUse the function `based_latex.get_latex_svg_data(expression)` to get a dictionary of the form```{dimensions: # Some dimension parameters (useful for HTML embedding)svg: # The SVG code.}```
